name: Ext_R5_VerificationResult_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.VerificationResult.status for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents VerificationResult.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/VerificationResult|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: attested | validated | in-process | req-revalid | val-fail | reval-fail | entered-in-error
element.definition: The validation status of the target (attested; validated; in process; requires revalidation; validation failed; revalidation failed).
element.comment: `VerificationResult.status` maps to R4B `VerificationResult.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: attested | validated | in-process | req-revalid | val-fail | reval-fail | entered-in-error
element.definition: The validation status of the target (attested; validated; in process; requires revalidation; validation failed; revalidation failed).
element.comment: `VerificationResult.status` maps to R4B `VerificationResult.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The validation status of the target.
